# Description

I am a PhD candidate at the Erasmus University of Rotterdam. I research the effectiveness of family-centered treatment in residential youth care at [iHUB](https://ihub.nu/). I am interested in open science and involving stakeholders in research design (e.g., youth, parents, youth care professionals).

```{r radarPlot, eval = FALSE}

member_name <- "Emily Tang"
special_skill <- NULL

OS_skills <- read_csv(here("static/OS_skills.csv")) %>%
  dplyr::filter(name %in% c("max", "min", member_name)) %>%
  dplyr::select(c(all_of(special_skill), "open access", "open source software", "reproducible analysis", "data sharing", "data management"))

# custom radar plot
radarchart(OS_skills,
  axistype = 0, seg = 10,
  pcol = alpha("#002328", 0.8), pfcol = alpha("#00B969", 0.6), plwd = 4, centerzero = TRUE, # polygon
  cglcol = "#7e7e7e", axislabcol = "#002328", caxislabels = seq(0, 10, 2), cglwd = 0.8 # grid
)

```
